conversation.text: Based on the user's constraints, I would recommend "Babel" as a potential recommendation. This movie tells the story of the Babels, a strange breed of four-foot- tall creatures who once coexisted happily with human beings on planet Earth. However, when the humans built a huge tower to taunt God, he became angry and drove the Babels underground, while scattering the humans to the corners of the Earth and giving them different languages to keep them separate.数千年后，三个Babels正在寻找地下寻找地图--该地图很快就被一只狗抢走了，这只狗把它交给了它的主人，一个广告商的名字叫Patrick。Babel们非常渴望找回地图，他们招募了 Patrick'儿子 David的帮助他们找到它(和地图)在邪恶Nemrod可以夺取它的力量之前
